message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you at $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still unable to go beyond $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
